description: Create a new empty layer in the document.

userMessage.error: Unable to create new layer. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Name for the new layer. Default is auto-generated.
Layer opacity from 0 to 100. Default is 100.

Blending mode. Possible values: NORMAL, DISSOLVE, DARKEN, MULTIPLY, COLOR_BURN, LINEAR_BURN, LIGHTEN, SCREEN, COLOR_DODGE, LINEAR_DODGE, OVERLAY, SOFT_LIGHT, HARD_LIGHT, VIVID_LIGHT, LINEAR_LIGHT, PIN_LIGHT, DIFFERENCE, EXCLUSION, HUE, SATURATION, COLOR, LUMINOSITY. Default is NORMAL.
Fill with neutral color for the blend mode. Default is false.

description: Duplicate the current layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to duplicate layer. Ensure a layer is selected.

params.paramDescription: Name for the duplicated layer. Default is original name with 'copy' suffix.

description: Delete the current layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to delete layer. Cannot delete the only layer in the document.

description: Rename the current layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to rename layer. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Set the opacity of the current layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to set layer opacity. Ensure a layer is selected.

params.paramDescription: Opacity percentage from 0 to 100. Default is 100.

description: Set the fill opacity of the current layer (affects layer content but not effects).

userMessage.error: Unable to set layer fill. Ensure a layer is selected.

params.paramDescription: Fill percentage from 0 to 100. Default is 100.

description: Set the blending mode of the current layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to set blend mode. Ensure a layer is selected.

params.paramDescription: Blending mode. Possible values: NORMAL, DISSOLVE, DARKEN, MULTIPLY, COLOR_BURN, LINEAR_BURN, LIGHTEN, SCREEN, COLOR_DODGE, LINEAR_DODGE, OVERLAY, SOFT_LIGHT, HARD_LIGHT, VIVID_LIGHT, LINEAR_LIGHT, PIN_LIGHT, DIFFERENCE, EXCLUSION, HUE, SATURATION, COLOR, LUMINOSITY. Default is NORMAL.

description: Hide the current layer from view.

userMessage.error: Unable to hide layer. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Make the current layer visible.

userMessage.error: Unable to show layer. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Lock the current layer to prevent changes.

userMessage.error: Unable to lock layer. Ensure a layer is selected.

params.paramDescription: What to lock. Possible values: ALL, TRANSPARENT_PIXELS, IMAGE_PIXELS, POSITION. Default is ALL.

description: Unlock the current layer to allow changes.

userMessage.error: Unable to unlock layer. Ensure a locked layer is selected.

description: Move the current layer up in the layer stack.

userMessage.error: Unable to move layer up. It may already be at the top.

description: Move the current layer down in the layer stack.

userMessage.error: Unable to move layer down. It may already be at the bottom.

description: Move the current layer to the top of the layer stack.

userMessage.error: Unable to move layer to top. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Move the current layer to the bottom of the layer stack.

userMessage.error: Unable to move layer to bottom. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Merge the current layer with the layer below.

userMessage.error: Unable to merge layers. Ensure there is a layer below to merge with.

description: Merge all visible layers into one.

userMessage.error: Unable to merge visible layers. Ensure there are visible layers to merge.

description: Flatten all layers into a single background layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to flatten image. Ensure a document is open.

description: Create a group from selected layers.

userMessage.error: Unable to create layer group. Select layers to group.

params.paramDescription: Name for the group. Default is 'Group'.

description: Ungroup the selected layer group.

userMessage.error: Unable to ungroup. Select a layer group first.

description: Link selected layers so they move together.

userMessage.error: Unable to link layers. Select multiple layers to link.

description: Unlink the selected linked layers.

userMessage.error: Unable to unlink layers. Select linked layers first.

description: Select all layers in the document.

userMessage.error: Unable to select all layers. Ensure a document is open.

description: Deselect all layers.

userMessage.error: Unable to deselect layers.

description: Select a layer by its name.

userMessage.error: Unable to find layer with the specified name.

params.paramDescription: Name of the layer to select.

description: Rasterize the current layer (convert vector/smart object to pixels).

userMessage.error: Unable to rasterize layer. The layer may already be rasterized.

description: Convert the current layer to a Smart Object.

userMessage.error: Unable to convert to Smart Object. Ensure a layer is selected.

description: Create a new adjustment layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to create adjustment layer. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Type of adjustment layer. Possible values: BRIGHTNESS_CONTRAST, LEVELS, CURVES, EXPOSURE, VIBRANCE, HUE_SATURATION, COLOR_BALANCE, BLACK_AND_WHITE, PHOTO_FILTER, CHANNEL_MIXER, COLOR_LOOKUP, INVERT, POSTERIZE, THRESHOLD, GRADIENT_MAP, SELECTIVE_COLOR. Default is BRIGHTNESS_CONTRAST.

description: Create a new fill layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to create fill layer. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Type of fill layer. Possible values: SOLID_COLOR, GRADIENT, PATTERN. Default is SOLID_COLOR.
Red component for solid color (0-255). Default is 128.
Green component for solid color (0-255). Default is 128.
Blue component for solid color (0-255). Default is 128.
